text: Hello, how are you this evening/morning?
I am good thanks, how are you?
I am good, have you ever heard about the organization "Save the Children"?
Yes but I do not know that much about it
Its an international non-government org that is focused on children's rights. It promotes relief and support for children in developing countries. Have you ever donated to a charity?
Yes I have made donations to help sick children

That is really wonderful. I believe donating is important for us to do no matter the amount. This organization helps sick children all around the world, especially those in war zones like Syria/Africa. Do you help sick children outside your home country?
I have helped children outside my country in the past. I believe donations of any amount help make a difference

You sound like a very generous person. I have personal history as my husband was a refugee as a child. We have a blended family. It just makes me sad that children have to suffer no matter where they are. Save the children is a great organization. Would you consider a donation to them?
Yes I agree and I would consider a donation to them
That is really great, this organization also helps with children's rights to health, education, safety, and much more. Your donation would make a tangible impact no matter the amount.
At this time I would like to donate $2.00
That would be wonderful, are you interested in their website?
Yes that would be great
Here is their website:   URL
Ok I will check it out now thank you have a good night
Before you go please a few more questions, just to clarify you are willing to donate $2 of your bonus to this organization?
Yes I am
Thank you for your donation. Please be ensured that the researcher will collect all donations and send it directly to the organization.
Ok thank you for your help and information
Thank you have a wonderful day, it was nice to chat with you.
You as well
